# composition Demos

## Background Fills

Layer with solid color background fill.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "bg_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF", "{k}": "#000000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "small_red", "palette": "bg_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "small_blue", "palette": "bg_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "solid_background", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "small_red"}, "layers": [{"name": "background", "fill": "#000000FF"}, {"name": "content", "map": ["...", ".R.", "..."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "transparent_background", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "small_red"}, "layers": [{"name": "content", "map": ["...", ".R.", "..."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "colored_background", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "small_red"}, "layers": [{"name": "background", "fill": "#00FF00FF"}, {"name": "content", "map": ["...", ".R.", "..."]}]}
```

</div>

## Basic Layer Stacking

Composition with layers stacked vertically. Top layer obscures bottom.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "stacking_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "red_square", "palette": "stacking_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "green_square", "palette": "stacking_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "blue_square", "palette": "stacking_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "two_layer_stack", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_square", "G": "green_square"}, "layers": [{"name": "bottom", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "top", "map": ["G"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "three_layer_stack", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_square", "G": "green_square", "B": "blue_square"}, "layers": [{"name": "layer1", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "layer2", "map": ["G"]}, {"name": "layer3", "map": ["B"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="basic">
</div>

## Blend Modes

Layers blended using various blend modes (multiply, screen, overlay).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "blend_demo_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF", "{g}": "#808080FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "red_base", "palette": "blend_demo_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "gray_overlay", "palette": "blend_demo_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "white_overlay", "palette": "blend_demo_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"w": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "multiply_blend", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_base", "G": "gray_overlay"}, "layers": [{"name": "base", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "overlay", "map": ["G"], "blend": "multiply"}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "screen_blend", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_base", "G": "gray_overlay"}, "layers": [{"name": "base", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "overlay", "map": ["G"], "blend": "screen"}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "overlay_blend", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_base", "G": "gray_overlay"}, "layers": [{"name": "base", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "overlay", "map": ["G"], "blend": "overlay"}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "add_blend", "size": [4, 4], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"R": "red_base", "G": "gray_overlay"}, "layers": [{"name": "base", "map": ["R"]}, {"name": "overlay", "map": ["G"], "blend": "add"}]}
```

## Layer Positioning

Sprites placed at specific positions within the composition grid.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "pos_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_red", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"r": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_green", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "pixel_blue", "palette": "pos_pal", "size": [2, 2], "regions": {"b": {"rect": [0, 0, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "diagonal_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R..", ".G.", "..B"]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "corner_placement", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {".": null, "R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green", "B": "pixel_blue"}, "layers": [{"map": ["R.G", "...", "B.."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "grid_fill", "size": [6, 6], "cell_size": [2, 2], "sprites": {"R": "pixel_red", "G": "pixel_green"}, "layers": [{"map": ["RGR", "GRG", "RGR"]}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="positioning">
</div>

## Multi-Sprite Scenes

Multi-layer scene with sky, ground, and multiple sprite types.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "scene_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{y}": "#FFFF00FF", "{c}": "#00FFFFFF", "{m}": "#FF00FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF", "{k}": "#000000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "tree", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 2]}, "k": {"rect": [1, 2, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sun", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"y": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "cloud", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"w": {"rect": [0, 1, 4, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "grass", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sky", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"c": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "simple_scene", "size": [12, 8], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {".": null, "S": "sun", "C": "cloud", "T": "tree", "G": "grass", "K": "sky"}, "layers": [{"name": "sky", "map": ["KKK", "KKK"]}, {"name": "ground", "map": ["...", "GGG"]}, {"name": "objects", "map": ["S.C", ".T."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "layered_scene", "size": [8, 8], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {".": null, "T": "tree", "G": "grass", "K": "sky"}, "layers": [{"name": "background", "map": ["KK", "GG"]}, {"name": "foreground", "map": ["..", "T."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "tile_grid", "size": [12, 12], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"G": "grass", "T": "tree"}, "layers": [{"map": ["GGG", "GTG", "GGG"]}]}
```

</div>
